project.welcome: Your friend Matt has asked you to help him get his cell phone back. The deans took it away from him, but he wants your help to steal it back. Search the school to find the necessary tools to enter the deans office, find his phone, and return it to him.
project.author: Erik Wathier

object.name: Offscreen
object.description: OFFSCREEn

object.name: player
object.description: Who are you? You're you.

object.name: Student_Entrance
object.description: The school parking lot sits to the west, while the doorway to enter the school is to the east.
object.initialdescription: (NOTE: type 'help' if you get stuck at any point)

object.name: Early_B_Hallway
object.description: Doors to classrooms fill the sides the sides of the hallway. South of this hallway is the cafateria. The B hallway continues to the east. West is the security station.

object.name: End_B_Hallway
object.description: To the north is the D hallway, where the pool and gym are. To the south is the C hallway, where the school administration offices are. To the west is the B hallway.

object.name: Security
object.description: This is the security center between the student entrance and the school. To the east is the B hallway. A guard stands watch, who checks your ID when you enter.

object.name: fountain
object.description: A water fountain. If you're thirsty, drink some water.
object.initialdescription: There is a water fountain along the south wall.

object.name: Mid_B_Hallway
object.description: Halfway down the hallway, you spot a water fountain on the south side of the hall. To the north is the room where announcements are given over the intercom.

object.name: Cafeteria
object.description: In the cafeteria, some guys are sitting at a table talking. You recognize one of these guys; your friend Liam. Other than them, the cafeteria seems fairly empty.

object.name: C_hallway
object.description: Most administrative offices are in the south end of this hall. Additionally, trophies and awards line the hallway, most of which are from atheltic events. To the north is a hallway intersection.

object.name: D_Hallway
object.description: The D hallway consists of the pool to the north, and the gym to the east. To the south is the intersection of several hallways.

object.name: Pool11
object.description: The pool is fairly empty; there is no swimming practice after school today. Students and teacher alike are welcome here after school. To the south is the rest of the hallway.
object.initialdescription: Some pool supplies are also sitting around, including some other unusual items.

object.name: Gym
object.description: On one end of the gym, there's an open court with a basketball lying around. You don't see anyone you know well here.

object.name: Door
object.description: The door to the dean's office. To the north is the rest of the C hallway.

object.name: Intercom_room
object.description: Inside the intercom room is Jason. Jason is currently monitoring the intercom, and is in charge of making announcements after school today. To the south is the B hallway.

object.name: Deans_office
object.description: Inside the room, you see the dean's desk. The desk is messy and covered with papers, but you don't see a phone on the desk. However, the desk has several drawers.

object.name: deans_plaque
object.description: The plaque lists the accomplisments of Dean Jackson. Graduated in the top 2% of this very high school 20 years ago. He was a star swimmer here as well, and continues to pursue swimming in the school pool most days afer school.

object.name: guard
object.description: This guard's job is to verify that students have their ID in order to enter the hallway. Don't try anything silly; this guard is good at his job.

object.name: water
object.description: Liquid H2O. Don't drink too much, it might lead to some unexpected consquences.

object.name: deans_ID
object.description: The dean's ID. On it is a picutre of Dean Jackson, and a magnetic strip for card readers.

object.name: liam
object.description: Liam, your friend. Your friend matt wanted Liam to hold onto the Dean's ID to give it to you.

object.name: plaque
object.description: The plaque reads: 'Mr. Jackson: Dean, Swimmer, Student. From his beginnings as a student here, Dean Jackson has set many swimming records. To this day, Dean Jackson can regularly be found swimming in the pool after school.'
object.initialdescription: There is a plaque on the wall with the picture of a dean you recognize.

object.name: bottle
object.description: Liam's water bottle. He wants you to fill it up for him.

object.name: dean
object.description: Dean Jackson. A tall, brown haired man who has a passion for swimming.
object.initialdescription: A familiar dean is currently swimming in the pool. Beside the pool are his belongings (stuff).

object.name: classrooms
object.description: It's a school. There are classrooms everywhere.

object.name: jason
object.description: Your friend, Jason, who handles after school announcements on the intercom.

object.name: intercom
object.description: It's an intercom. Jason probably knows how to use it.
object.initialdescription: There's an intercom sitting on the desk.

object.name: students
object.description: You recognize these students as members of the school's varsity basketball team. It would be best to not interrupt their practice; they have a big game tomorrow night.
object.initialdescription: There are some students playing basketball in the gym.

object.name: random_phone
object.description: You notice nothing unexpected.

object.name: mphone
object.description: Matt's phone. Bring it to him! He's in the parking lot waiting.

object.name: list
object.description: You notice nothing unexpected.

object.name: fhf
object.description: It's a light switch on the wall of the deans room. Chances are, it can be used to turn on and off the light in the room.

object.name: student_id
object.description: This is your student ID.

object.name: table
object.description: It's a table. The table has seen better days. Your friends are sitting around it eating a snack.

object.name: trophies
object.description: Your school has won a lot of awards, most of which are for athletic achievements. There are many first place trophies here.

object.name: deans_stuff
object.description: The dean's belongings appears to consist of a sweatshirt, a pair of jeans, some gum, and a laptop.
object.initialdescription: A pile of the dean's stuff lies on a chair.

object.name: deans_key
object.description: It appears to be a key to the deans office.

object.name: desk
object.description: The dean's desk. Inside one of the drawers is probably Matt's phone. It has a top drawer, center drawer, middle drawer, and bottom drawer.

object.name: top_drawer
object.description: A desk drawer. Desk drawers are openable.

object.name: center_drawer
object.description: A desk drawer. Desk drawers are openable.

object.name: swimming_pool
object.description: The swimming pool.

object.name: basketball
object.description: Stop thinking about playing basketball, you have a job to do!
object.initialdescription: There is a basketball sitting on the floor beside you.

object.name: unsearchable_stuff
object.description: you should not be able to see this message, if you do its a bug and that means i have to fix a really complicated function so please dont see this msg

object.name: bleach
object.description: A bucket of bleach.
object.initialdescription: There's some cleaning supplies in the corner, but the only thing you recognize is some bleach.

object.name: middle_drawer
object.description: A desk drawer. Desk drawers are openable.

object.name: bottom_drawer
object.description: A desk drawer. Desk drawers are openable.

object.name: Parking_Lot
object.description: To the east is the entrance to the school.
object.initialdescription: Matt is in the school parking lot waiting for you to go retrieve his phone. If you manage to find his phone, you should probably come back here to return it to him.

object.name: matt
object.description: Matt. Short for Matthew. Your close friend, who wants you to get his phone back for him.
object.initialdescription: Matt is in the school parking lot waiting for you to go retrieve his phone.

object.name: sitting
object.description: You're currently sitting on the floor.

nogo.s: You need to stand up first.
nogo.w: You need to stand up first.
nogo.ne: You need to stand up first.
nogo.nw: You need to stand up first.
nogo.e: You need to stand up first.
nogo.se: You need to stand up first.
nogo.sw: You need to stand up first.
nogo.n: You need to stand up first.
nogo.up: You need to stand up first.
nogo.down: You need to stand up first.

routines.routine: if (dobj == player) { println("Not physically possible."); }
if (dobj.portable == 1) { if (dobj.holder != player) { println("(Taken)"); dobj.holder = player;} }
println("Kill them? With what? Your bare hands? No.");
println("You failed to start an interesting conversation with yourself.");
println("Your medicore social skills prohibit you from starting a conversation with that.");
println("...");
println("*sniff*");
println("What are you waiting for?");
println("Don't yell in a school, people might get the wrong idea.");
println("You jumped up. Then fell down. That's gravity.");
println("That's not part of a healthy diet.");
println("You can't drink that.");
println("Why are you asking that for something? It has nothing to give you...");
println("You can't do that while the dean is here.");

project.walkthrough: e,e,s,talk to liam,n,e,fill up bottle,w,s,talk to liam,n,e,e,n,n,s,s,w,n,use intercom,s,e,e,n,n,search stuff,s,s,s,unlock door,s,open bottom drawer,n,n,w,w,w,w,w
